results.short_desc: firelock nxt 1/2 in. ips 300 psi cast bronze low pressure actuator 776 low pressure actuator
results.long_desc: the victaulic series 776 low pressure actuator is a pneumatically actuated valve that is used to trigger the dry pre action or deluge fire protection system. the series 776 features a single trip point regardless of supply water pressure. the series 776 is designed to allow the sprinkler system to operate with a low air or gas pressure of 13 psi/90 kpa regardless of supply water pressure. the series 776 is designed to actuate at 7 psi/45 kpa system pressure thus releasing supply water pressure from the sprinkler control valve diaphragm and actuating the sprinkler control valve in its intended manner.

results.short_desc: 3 in. press wrot copper 90 degree elbow lead free pc607 3 pxp 90 elbow
results.long_desc: the nibco press system copper 90 degree elbow features an inboard bead and epdm o ring. simply applying pressure from a pressing tool tightens the o ring onto the tube ensuring a clean watertight seal in seconds with no flame solder or flux. nibco press system fittings join copper tubing systems in residential and commercial potable hot chilled and process water applications for plumbing and hvac systems. the press fittings can also be installed underground. nibco press system copper fittings are backed by a 50 year limited warranty.
results.product_attribute: {'Maximum Pressure Rating': '200 PSI', 'Specifications Met': 'ASTM B75 C12200, ASME B16/51, CSA MSE 13 and PS-117, UPC Approved', 'Product Type': 'Straight', 'Material': 'Copper', 'Resistance Properties/Features': 'Dezincification-Resistant', 'Selling Size': '3 in', 'Connection Size': '3 in', 'Application': 'Plumbing and HVAC System', 'Bend Angle': '90 deg', 'Manufacture Process': 'Wrot', 'Connection Type': 'Pres x Pres'}

results.short_desc: 3 in. fitting x press wrot copper 45 degree elbow lead free pc606-2 3 ftgxp 45 elbow
results.long_desc: the nibco press system copper 45 degree elbow features an inboard bead and epdm o ring. simply applying pressure from a pressing tool tightens the o ring onto the tube ensuring a clean watertight seal in seconds with no flame solder or flux. the elbow has press connections. the fitting provides a method of changing the pipeline direction by 45 degrees. nibco press system fittings are designed to join with seamless copper water tube in residential and commercial potable hot chilled and process water applications for plumbing and hvac systems. nibco press system copper fittings are backed by a 50 year limited warranty.
results.product_attribute: {'Application': 'Plumbing and HVAC System', 'Resistance Properties/Features': 'Dezincification-Resistant', 'Connection Type': 'FTG x Pres', 'Material': 'Wrot Copper', 'Specifications Met': 'ASTM B75 Alloy C12200, ASME B16/51, CSA MSE-13 and PS117, UPC Approved', 'Product Type': 'Straight', 'Maximum Pressure Rating': '200 PSI', 'Selling Size': '3 in', 'Bend Angle': '45 deg'}

results.short_desc: 3 in. fitting x press wrot copper 90 degree elbow lead free pc607-2 3 ftgxp 90 elbow
results.long_desc: the nibco press system copper 90 degree fitting elbow features an inboard bead and epdm o ring. simply applying pressure from a pressing tool tightens the o ring onto the tube ensuring a clean watertight seal in seconds with no flame solder or flux. the elbow has a male fitting end and a press connection. the fitting provides a method of changing the pipeline direction by 90 degrees between a press connection and fitting connection which can either be soldered or pressed. nibco press system copper fittings are backed by a 50 year limited warranty.
results.product_attribute: {'Application': 'Plumbing and HVAC System', 'Resistance Properties/Features': 'Dezincification-Resistant', 'Selling Size': '3 in', 'Maximum Pressure Rating': '200 PSI', 'Specifications Met': 'ASTM B75 C12200, ASME B16/51, CSA MSE 13 and PS-117, UPC Approved', 'Product Type': 'Straight', 'Material': 'Copper', 'Bend Angle': '90 deg', 'Material Grade': 'C12200', 'Manufacture Process': 'Wrot', 'Connection Type': 'Male Fitting x Pres'}
